install.name: VirtueMart Multiple Display
install.author: Jason Lim
install.copyright: Copyright (C) 2004-2008 Soeren Eberhardt-Biermann. All rights reserved.
install.description: Modified to enable more flexibility in positioning (horizontal + vertical) and space saving. Shows the latest, featured, best selling, and/or random products from VirtueMart.

param.name: show_new
param.label: Show new products?
param.description: Shows the newest products from your portfolio.

param.name: show_topten
param.label: Show TopTen products?
param.description: Shows the TopTen besteller products from your portfolio.

param.name: show_special
param.label: Show Featured Products?
param.description: Shows featured products from your portfolio.

param.name: show_random
param.label: Show random products?
param.description: Show randomly choosen products from your portfolio.

param.name: show_price
param.label: Show Product Price?
param.description: Defines wether the product price is displayed or not.

param.name: show_addtocart
param.label: Show Add-To-Cart Link?
param.description: Defines wether the Add-To-Cart Link is displayed or not.

param.name: max_items
param.label: No of items display
param.description: Number of items to display in each tab

param.name: display_style
param.label: Diplay Style
param.description: Here you can decide wether the products are shown in a horizontal or vertical list

param.name: products_per_row
param.label: Products per row
param.description: Only when Table is selected: The Number of columns per row in the table for the product snapshots.

param.name: featured_tabname
param.label: Tab Lebel for 'Featured'
param.description: Text to show on the tab for featured products

param.name: new_tabname
param.label: Tab Lebel for 'New Products'
param.description: Text to show on the tab for new products

param.name: topten_tabname
param.label: Tab Lebel for 'Most Popular'
param.description: Text to show on the tab for most popular products

param.name: random_tabname
param.label: Tab Lebel for 'Random'
param.description: Text to show on the tab for random products

param.name: cache
param.label: Enable Cache
param.description: Select whether to cache the content of this module

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable), this allows individual module styling

param.name: class_sfx
param.label: Menu Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the menu items
